name: Harvest Island (itch)
description:
The World Is Big...

Play the first chapter of Harvest Island, an upcoming pixel-art, cute, semi-farming simulator set on a remote island. Take on the role of Will and help your sister catch a raccoon to offer to the gods. Inspired by Animal Crossing, Harvest Moon, and Rune Factory.

Overall Features

  • Introduction to Harvest Island with a 15-30min of gameplay.
  • Collect interesting items found from the island.
  • Inspired by Animal Crossing, Harvest Moon, and Rune Factory.
  • Experience Cuteness.

Join Us !
